Title: 127 Hours
Overview: The true story of mountain climber Aron Ralston's remarkable adventure to save himself after a fallen boulder crashes on his arm and traps him in an isolated canyon in Utah.
Tagline: There is no force more powerful than the will to live.
Keywords: mountains, despair, adventure, utah, alone, canyon, climbing, based on true story, rescue, survival, escape, true, trapped, boulder, adventurer, flashback, climber, isolated, hikers, very little dialogue
production_companies: Fox Searchlight Pictures, Warner Bros., Cloud Eight Films, Pathé, Film4, Everest Entertainment, HandMade Films
Cast: James Franco, Kate Mara, Amber Tamblyn
